name: Abnormal Attendance Report
query:
select employee as 'كود الموظف::120', employee_name as 'إسم الموظف::250', posting_date as 'التاريخ::100', 
shift as 'الوردية::150', time_in as 'وقت الحضور::120', time_out as 'وقت الإنصراف::120' 
from `tabEmployee Transactions`
where docstatus<2 and posting_date>=%(from_date)s and posting_date<=%(to_date)s and (early_exit_minutes>0 or lateness_minutes>0)
and employee in (select name from `tabEmployee` where company=%(company)s and business_unit=%(business_unit)s) 
order by employee, posting_date
